words.source: H1961 Qal wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'And it came to pass', ESV 'And', NASB 'Because' — KJV most literal; ESV/NASB restructure
H3588 conjunction; KJV 'because', ESV 'because', NASB 'because' — all agree
H3372 Qal perf 3cp; KJV 'feared', ESV 'feared', NASB 'feared' — all agree
H3205 article + Piel participle fem pl abs; KJV/ESV/NASB all 'the midwives'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H430 article + noun masc pl abs (majestic plural); KJV/ESV/NASB all 'God'
H6213 Qal wayyiqtol 3ms; KJV 'that he made', ESV 'he gave', NASB 'He established' — all agree God acted on their behalf
Prep + 3mp suffix (no Strong's); KJV 'them', ESV 'them', NASB 'them' — all agree
H1004 noun masc pl abs 'houses, households'; KJV 'houses', ESV 'families', NASB 'households' — ESV/NASB interpret as 'families/households'; KJV uses literal 'houses'
